titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on nicosulfuron formulated product ("Accent").

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/29/2002--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 2006, the suspension of duty on nicosulfuron formulated product ("Accent") (herbicide).
